类 LoadingLayoutProxy

    • com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.LoadingLayoutProxy

    public class LoadingLayoutProxy
extends Object
implements ILoadingLayout

    • 方法详细资料

      • addLayout

        public void addLayout(LoadingLayout layout)
        This allows you to add extra LoadingLayout instances to this proxy. This is only necessary if you keep your own instances, and want to have them included in any createLoadingLayoutProxy(...) calls.
        参数:
        layout - - LoadingLayout to have included.

      • setLastUpdatedLabel

        public void setLastUpdatedLabel(CharSequence label)
        从接口复制的说明: ILoadingLayout
        Set the Last Updated Text. This displayed under the main label when Pulling
        指定者:
        setLastUpdatedLabel 在接口中 ILoadingLayout
        参数:
        label - - Label to set

      • setLoadingDrawable

        public void setLoadingDrawable(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
        从接口复制的说明: ILoadingLayout
        Set the drawable used in the loading layout. This is the same as calling setLoadingDrawable(drawable, Mode.BOTH)
        指定者:
        setLoadingDrawable 在接口中 ILoadingLayout
        参数:
        drawable - - Drawable to display

      • setRefreshingLabel

        public void setRefreshingLabel(CharSequence refreshingLabel)
        从接口复制的说明: ILoadingLayout
        Set Text to show when the Widget is refreshing setRefreshingLabel(releaseLabel, Mode.BOTH)
        指定者:
        setRefreshingLabel 在接口中 ILoadingLayout
        参数:
        refreshingLabel - - CharSequence to display

      • setPullLabel

        public void setPullLabel(CharSequence label)
        从接口复制的说明: ILoadingLayout
        Set Text to show when the Widget is being Pulled setPullLabel(releaseLabel, Mode.BOTH)
        指定者:
        setPullLabel 在接口中 ILoadingLayout
        参数:
        label - - CharSequence to display

      • setReleaseLabel

        public void setReleaseLabel(CharSequence label)
        从接口复制的说明: ILoadingLayout
        Set Text to show when the Widget is being pulled, and will refresh when released. This is the same as calling setReleaseLabel(releaseLabel, Mode.BOTH)
        指定者:
        setReleaseLabel 在接口中 ILoadingLayout
        参数:
        label - - CharSequence to display

      • setTextTypeface

        public void setTextTypeface(android.graphics.Typeface tf)
        从接口复制的说明: ILoadingLayout
        Set's the Sets the typeface and style in which the text should be displayed. Please see TextView#setTypeface(Typeface).
        指定者:
        setTextTypeface 在接口中 ILoadingLayout
